titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Interior to repay States for amounts expended by States to operate units of the National Park System during a Government shutdown.
To require the Secretary of the Interior to repay States for amounts expended by States to operate units of the National Park System during a Government shutdown.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of the Interior to repay states for amounts expended to operate units of the National Park System during a government shutdown.
